metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3732 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel's OverlayFS subsystem in the way theuser mounts the TmpFS filesystem with OverlayFS. This flaw allows a localuser to gain access to hidden files that should not be accessible.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
